stripped_text: Before taking your first turn, you may switch this identity with any copy of Jinteki Biotech. click click click: Flip this identity. The Brewery: When you flip this identity, do 2 net damage. The Tank: When you flip this identity, shuffle all cards in Archives into R&D. The Greenhouse: When you flip this identity, place 4 advancement counters on 1 installed card that you can advance.

title: Jinteki Biotech: Life Imagined
